name: TalkSnow
_source: speak;Snow;Ah, Young Sages! You finally returned!
speak;Sages;Hey, Snow.|You've been researching treatments for pops, right?
speak;Snow;Yes, no avail. I'm running out of ideas...|But, I'm not giving up! His Majesty deserves my full effort!
speak;Sages;Thank you, Snow... No matter what happens.
speak;Snow;I appreciate your praise... Now, allow me to get back to my reading.
